short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows an icon with current electricity pricing information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polls the Chicago Com Edison hourly pricing API to get the current price for electricity if you are on their hourly pricing program, and displays the current price as well as green/yellow/red color indicator in the pinned extension icon.
